extendedInfo.description: Collaborative shopping list and grocery list app that supports sharing and syncing for free. It comes with an Artificial Intelligence component that predicts your future shopping lists. Create and share grocery shopping lists with friends and family for absolutely free by using Rainbow Shopping List. Shopping Lists are synchronized across devices instantly as changes happen. Add items via bar codes, speech or the traditional way. Say goodbye to having to press the mic button every time you want to add one single item. The burst-mode speech recognition allows you to add multiples items by speaking continuously to your phone. Take a photo and attach it to the item. Add a time reminder. Add a location reminder. Add a "space-time" reminder. Get reminded when you're at the right place at the right time. This is the only shopping list you will ever need.Tired of making your own grocery shopping list? Have Rainbow List's AI (Artificial Intelligence) compile the list for you instead. The Rainbow AI understands and internalizes your buying decisions and make predictions of what would you most likely to buy.What are you waiting for? Get it now and let's go shopping!======= Features =======* Sync and share for FREE* Powerful edit mode allows you to make changes to multiple items at the same time* AI with basic prediction capability* Speech recognition (burst mode)* Barcode scanning* Add photo to individual item* Add note to individual item* Unit price comparison* Search* and MORE!Question?Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ChakDevelopmentTwitter: http://www.twitter.com/ChakDevelopmentWebsite: http://www.chakdev.comKeywords: grocery list, shopping list, grocery, shopping, Android, speech recognition, barcode, photo, picture, note, sync, cloud, sharing, friends, family, shopping list app, grocery list app, collaborative shopping list

reviews.title: Great shopping list app
reviews.comment: Great shopping list app. Intuitive with a nice simple interface
reviews.author: Ted Targosz

reviews.title: Bold design, but looks great!
reviews.comment: Nowadays, most people are heavily promote holo style design. But this author takes a complete different approach, by using a very bold color combination. However, the result are surprisingly good. Well done! Looks there is no 1 design rule for all. Hope to test out the prediction feature. Need to wait for more data input before I were able to do so.
reviews.author: Yan Cheng Cheok

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works fine, nice to have something dedicated to shopping lists as Keep is nice but not that powerful for lists. It\'s fun to use, and has some great features, the prediction could be fun to use. Would have preferred to have the barcode scanner and compare part of the app, instead of having to download them separately.
reviews.author: Alexandre Isurugi

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: If I may suggest a sorting mechanism by user defined category.
reviews.author: InsightLighting505

reviews.title: Most used app I have
reviews.comment: Incredibly handy.
reviews.author: Evan Davis

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: It sucked
reviews.author: Juliane Zepeda

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: Rob Silva

reviews.title: Simple and useful
reviews.comment: Great app that does what it\'s supposed to without gimmicks. Simple and fast, keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Luka Kaspar

reviews.title: Simple, yet powerful
reviews.comment: Nice interface and the colours make it fun to use. It\'s lightweight, but has enough features for anything I can think of.
reviews.author: Andrei Poenaru

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is great and uses common sense for making the shopping intuitive. Nice!
reviews.author: Jumy Eleross\303\253

reviews.title: As simple or as detailed as you need it to be.
reviews.comment: So far I am really liking this.  Later today my wife and I will start using the shared list feature, which will make shopping easier for the 2 of us to do.  Great app!
reviews.author: Aj Newkirk

reviews.title: Very nice app!
reviews.comment: As good as Google Keep but waay better for shopping lists though that\'s for sure. I love the price feature so it shows that I\'m not paying the wrong price or anything. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Harsh Arutla

reviews.title: Simple and Colorful useful app
reviews.comment: Nice interface with useful features like scanning of barcodes to make a list, reminders, price comparison and individual notes for items. Will try Location reminder in Pro version as that sounds very helpful too.
reviews.author: Dinesh Kumar

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: It has replaced my out of milk app that I use to sync shipping lists. It looks good, works well, and is awesome.
reviews.author: Mordy T

reviews.comment: Simple and intuitive. Oh small typo in settings (ai trainig should read ai training)
reviews.author: Nick Champness

reviews.title: great shopping list app
reviews.comment: no complaints
reviews.author: Yehoshua Stokar

reviews.title: Great app, lacks some key features not very stable
reviews.comment: To start with the good things: the app looks great, works good and I really love the option to add via speech!  There are a few things I would like to see for this app: - more possibilities to sort, especially the use of categories (set the sort order for the categories manually, not alphabetically)  - delete crossed off items with one action (this would make it possible to reuse the same list over and over again)  - Use database while adding, including my own items (or make it clear how to do that)
reviews.author: Midas Kuiper

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: Really helpful.
reviews.author: Aaron Axisa

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Love the syncing, simplicity and features. Just wish it allowed unit with the quantity, but it is still very useful.
reviews.author: tannia a

reviews.title: New ideas in shopping list? Yes, it\'s possible.
reviews.comment: Share your shopping list in a social network.
reviews.author: Martin Varga
